name: Lap of the Lakes
info: Sign on is accross from the Blue Gardenia. If you're driving up, please take care not to block any entrances/exits to houses or laneways etc
Sign on closes at 18:50 with first race off at 19:00
The format on the night will be dependent on numbers but most likely will be:
• 3.5 laps for Scratch and Semi Scratch (45km)
Races will finish at the cottage / turn for Ballysmuttan
